contents.content: UNIT 03 面试礼仪 Interview Etiquette
Lesson 4 身体语言 Body Language
杰克和玛丽在讨论面试中要注意的身体语言。

contents.title: 杰克：面试中的身体语言与求职者的形象密切相关。
contents.answer: Body language in the interview is closely related to the job-hunter's image.

contents.title: 玛丽：这是自然。
contents.answer: Surely it is.

contents.title: 杰克：面试时，眼睛要望着对方，以显示出你在认真听对方的讲话。
contents.answer: You should look the interviewer in the eye so as to show that you are carefully listening to him.

contents.content: 其实，在你有机会正式开始面试之前，你给人的第一印象就已经产生了。除了服饰、相貌，神态、举止也会直接影响面试官对你的评判。

contents.title: 玛丽：可以在适当的时候点头、提问，表示你已经听懂或是对对方的话很感兴趣。
contents.answer: You can nod or ask questions at the right time to show that you have already understood or you are quite interested in his words.

contents.title: 杰克：就坐时，一般双手交叉，身体前倾，以示尊敬。
contents.answer: When you are seated, bent forward a little with your hands crossed, to show you respect the interviewer.

contents.title: 玛丽：不要动来动去。这样很不礼貌，也会制造紧张气氛。
contents.answer: Don't move from time to time. It is very impolite and will make you nervous.

contents.title: 杰克：端正的坐姿可以传达出你的自信。
contents.answer: Proper posture can show your confi dence.

contents.content: 当面试官欢迎你的时候，应当与对方进行眼神接触，握手时要力度适中，并且保持恰当距离。当你就坐的时候，要放松身体，挺直而坐，略微前倾，面带微笑。交流中目光要注视对方，但不可死盯着人看。如果不止一个人在场，要不时地用目光扫视一下其他人，以示尊重和平等。

contents.title: 玛丽：最好面带微笑，赢得面试官的好感。
contents.answer: The best would be you have a smile on your face in the interview to win a good impression of the interviewer.

contents.title: 杰克：也要注意眼神交流。
contents.answer: Pay attention to keeping eye contact as well.

contents.title: 玛丽：面试过程中一定要有耐心。
contents.answer: Throughout the interview you should maintain patience.

contents.title: 杰克：总之，面试中要保持大方得体的举止。
contents.answer: In a word, you should keep decent manners in the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：这样才能给面试官留下好的印象，增加成功几率。
contents.answer: Only in this way can you leave the interviewer a good impression and achieve success.

contents.content: 身体语言可以传达出自信以及真诚，还有你的承压水平、开放程度。如果面试时身体语言出错，可能会使面试官产生不好的印象，认为你轻浮。

contents.title: 1.好的举止体现出好的修养。
contents.answer: Good manners show good self-cultivation.

contents.title: 2.你应当知道如何进行眼神交流。
contents.answer: You should know how to use eye contact.

contents.title: 3.当你坐下时，不要动来动去。
contents.answer: Don't move from time to time when you are seated.

contents.title: 4.面试时应当注意你的言谈举止。
contents.answer: When you attend the interview, you should pay attention to your manner.

contents.title: 5.面试时言谈举止应当大方得体。
contents.answer: You should keep decent manners in the interview.

contents.title: 6.就坐时，双手交叉，置于身前。
contents.answer: When you are seated, keep your hands crossed in front of you.

contents.title: 7.得体的行为举止会赢得面试官的青睐。
contents.answer: Decent manners can win the favor of the interviewer.

contents.title: 8.那些不礼貌的言行不应当出现在面试中。
contents.answer: Impolite expressions and manners should not appear in the interview.

contents.title: 9.面试时要认真并且耐心地听取对方的言谈。
contents.answer: In the interview you should listen to the interviewer carefully and patiently.

contents.title: 10.面试中适时的点头可以传达出你对谈话内容的理解。
contents.answer: In an interview, you can nod at the right time to show that you have understood what is being said.

contents.content: in order to 以便，为了
